text: Toto ye yabakania okhulia ebifwile nende amatsayi nende inyama yeyimbitsi, nende eshiarumbulilwakho ebise bwokhushisinza lilali elira lia Nyasaye, Habula ulia wulilwa nende okhubula shingala akhola, obulali okhwikomba nohombo okhubura eshichelo, awo ye abula tsimbii. Toto Nyasaye ni omulesheli owetsimbabaasi
